body.name: Nelko Bluetooth Thermal Shipping Label Printer, Wireless 4x6 Shipping Label Printer for Shipping Packages, Support Android, iPhone and Windows, Widely Used for Amazon, Ebay, Shopify, Etsy, USPS
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Go Wireless by Bluetooth】Get the "Shipping Printer Pro" app from Google Play or Apple Store to print via Bluetooth on your NELKO Bluetooth thermal label printer for iOS and Android. Printing shipping labels has never been easier. Windows 7 or later computers can also print via Bluetooth. For Mac users with M1 or M2 CPUs, install the app from the App Store and connect to the printer via Bluetooth through the app. Note: All devices cannot be directly connected to Bluetooth and need to be used through the app.

【Print via USB】For Windows (7 and later), Mac OS,Chrome OS, you can connect the desktop label printer via USB cable. [Note that Mac OS only works with USB connection, you can not print via Bluetooth].

【Good Helper for Cost Saving】Advanced thermal direct technology is adopted to achieve the printing speed of 150 mm/s, up to 72 sheets 4x6 labels/min. High speed brings high efficiency and helps your business grow faster! 203 DPI makes printing clearer. No ink, no toner, only thermal labels needed. Both fanfold labels and roll labels could be used. Label size: labels width ranges from 1.54" to 4.1"(40-104 mm), such as 4x6, 3x2, 3x1, 2x1 thermal labels and so on. Ideal for Christmas gift!

【Strong Platform Compatibility】This bluetooth shipping label printer can work with virtually all platforms, including Amazon, Ebay, Shopify, USPS, UPS, Esty, PayPal, Poshmark,etc.(Note: Please remember to download the label to be printed on the corresponding platform before printing, then upload it to the editor APP "Shipping Printer Pro" for printing).

【Professional Brand】Printer driver, instruction videos and problem shooting videos are provided in U-Disk for better setting. NELKO support team provides free, lifetime, and technical support. If you have any questions about this bluetooth shipping label printer, please feel free to leave us a message.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 For Phone 2 For Mac

How to use PL70E Bluetooth Shipping Desktop Label Printer via Phone? Step 1: Scan to install "Shipping Printer Pro" APP Step 2: Allow APP access and open "Bluetooth", "Location" Step 3: Tap "Not connected" and connect printer Step 4: Tap "File" Step 5: Select file Step 6: Tap "More settings" to adjust density Step 7: Tap print icon to print Notes: If received files from other app, open with "Shipping Printer Pro" app. Q: Why printer keeps feeding paper and prints nothing/ shows chinese character above?A: This may be caused by setting up not correctly on Windows. Try uninstall and reinstall the driver, then long press the feed button untill it beeps once (approximately 3 seconds) to calibrate the paper, the try print again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Setup Great Quality!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Nelko Bluetooth Thermal Shipping Label Printer, and I must say it has been a game-changer for my shipping operations. This wireless 4x6 shipping label printer offers exceptional convenience, reliability, and efficiency that have significantly improved my shipping process.First and foremost, the wireless functionality of this printer is a true blessing. Gone are the days of dealing with tangled cords and limited mobility. With the Bluetooth connectivity, I can print labels from anywhere in my workspace without having to worry about being tethered to a computer or printer. This has allowed me to optimize my workflow and streamline the entire shipping process.The printing quality of the Nelko printer is outstanding. The thermal printing technology ensures crisp, clear, and smudge-free labels, providing a professional look to my packages. The 4x6 label size is perfect for most shipping requirements, accommodating all the necessary information, including barcodes, addresses, and tracking numbers, with ample space for customization. The printer is also compatible with all major shipping platforms, making it versatile for any business.Setup was a breeze. It took me just a few minutes to unbox the printer, connect it to my device via Bluetooth, and install the necessary drivers. The user-friendly interface and straightforward instructions made the process seamless, even for someone like me who is not particularly tech-savvy.Another standout feature of the Nelko printer is its speed. It can churn out labels in seconds, ensuring that I can handle high-volume shipments efficiently. This is especially beneficial during busy periods or when meeting tight deadlines. The printer also handles continuous label rolls, eliminating the need for constant label reloading and saving me valuable time.Durability is a crucial factor in any business tool, and the Nelko printer excels in this regard. It is built with high-quality materials and feels sturdy. The printer is designed to withstand the rigors of daily use, ensuring long-lasting performance without any significant wear and tear. This gives me peace of mind, knowing that the printer will continue to deliver exceptional results over time.Furthermore, the printer's compatibility with various label brands and its ability to print both shipping labels and other types of labels, such as barcode labels and product labels, make it a versatile tool for my business needs. I appreciate its flexibility and the ability to adapt to different labeling requirements without the need for multiple devices.Lastly, the customer support provided by Nelko has been outstanding. They were prompt in addressing my queries and provided helpful guidance whenever needed. It's always reassuring to know that you have reliable support backing up your investment.In conclusion, the Nelko Bluetooth Thermal Shipping Label Printer is a game-changer for anyone involved in shipping and logistics. Its wireless functionality, exceptional print quality, ease of use, speed, durability, and versatility make it an invaluable tool for optimizing shipping operations. If you're looking to enhance efficiency and professionalism in your shipping process, I highly recommend the Nelko Bluetooth Thermal Shipping Label Printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing printer for the price
reviews.reviewText: I replaced an old, buggy Dymo 4XL label printer with this one. It prints beautiful labels and is really fast. Loving it so far. I'm using it with a USB connection to a desktop Mac, and it was easy to set up. Download drivers (a few seconds) and plug it in. Done and ready.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bluetooth with Phone App is the easiest usage for this.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So far so good. Works easily with my iPhone and the app for the printer. It also comes with a plug for my computer which would make it work easier if I had to mass print which I do not. I have roll tags and it pulls them in and prints well. I have only used this item via the app on my iPhone. The app lets you print via images or files so it makes it pretty easy. Overall I have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for sellers!!!
reviews.reviewText: Was struggling to keep up with manually printing / taping depop orders to my packages so decided to go all in on a wireless printer last summer. This thing is awesome!! So compact and easy to use. Simply peel and stick on your labels. Would highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great printer but not printing dark enough
reviews.reviewText: This printer has saved me so much time. I’ve had for less than a week, install was quick and painless but I’m having issue with the printing. It is not printing labels very dark. The address is coming out faded so I’m not sure if it will continue getting lighter to where it’s unusable or what.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. The directions could be better. f you have a problem with labels not lining up after changing label size, you need to recalabrate by holding the lit function button until it beeps, then they should work. This was not made clear in the instructions, and I almost sent the printer back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this printer!
reviews.reviewText: I started to re-sell on eBay for a little extra money. When I started selling more frequently I decided to invest in a label printer as well as a shipping scale so I could do everything right from home. This was the printer I chose to go with. I couldn’t be happier! It’s super easy to use and I do everything right from my phone! You download the app and you can purchase your shipping label right through eBay (or whatever selling platform you’re using) and open it up in the provided app, I rotate, crop, and print…. it’s that simple. Shipping was the one thing that kept me from selling online but I’m glad I tried it and this printer makes it so incredibly easy anyone can do it! It’s also thermal so you never need to buy anything except labels! No ink required! It also comes with a very generous amount of labels, 50 I Think!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prints well after you figure it out
reviews.reviewText: I wasted a lot of labels messing with the settings trying to get it right. It works well now and I'm mostly happy with it. I never like it when the app is obviously Chinese and it needs access to my Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Location in order to use it.*You have to save the label as a 4x6 or crop your full sheet to that size in order for it to fit properly*The app does do an auto crop which is a time-saver

reviews.reviewTitle: It is worth more than 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: It is a game changer for me. So convenient, efficient, and fast.It saved me from spending on cartridge, paper and the label sleeve when needed to ship.I purchased the other thermal printers, spent over 2 hours to try to figure out how to install and operate. I ended up returning it and switching to this one.This one took me 5min to install and print the label easily.Pros: fast, convenient as it has bluetooth where I can print from upstairs or downstairs, space efficient (so small and light), cost efficient Cons: sometimes it doesn’t print straight from the label provided from the stores. I have to save it to my photo library in order to print the label wirelessly. But it’s quick to compromise this cons anyways.Overall, i’m happy with the purchase. I should’ve purchased a while ago.It would be the best if I can print this directly from the app without transferring to my photo library.5 stars from me!!! Recommended!Well, after 2 weeks I used the product. Not sure how long it will last! It is another story :)

Die Installation ist sehr einfach wenn man die nötigen Treiber, die dabei sind, installiert. Die Bluetooth Verbindung über Handy sowie über Laptop klappt schnell und reibungslos. Man stellt die korrekte Etikettengrösse ein und dann kann es auch schon losgehen. Wir drucken damit nur DHL Versandlabels und das klappt gut, sowohl mit der Größe der originalen DHL Etiketten (103x199 , dazu muss man allerdings im Drucker bei den Druckeinstellungen ein Custom Label anlegen mit den passenden Maßen, also 103x199). Mit den Labels, die dabei waren (4“ x 6“) klappt es auch. Hier sollte man allerdings die Größe im DHL Geschäftskundenportal vorher anpassen. Aber alles kein Aufwand. Nun zum wichtigsten, der Drucker erkennt sich automatisch die Größe indem man neue Labels einfach einlegt und die Taste auf den Drucker etwa 3 Sekunden drückt. Danach fährt der Drucker das eingelegte Label mehrfach ab und kennt dann die Maße und alles ist kalibriert. Die Stärke sollte man etwas hochdrehen, ich habe sie bei 8, damit sind alle Barcodes perfekt lesbar. Und außerdem druckt der Drucker sehr schnell. Das perfekt gerät für kleinere Firmen, die nicht 100e Label am Tag drucken. Anders auch wenn es mal mehr wird, macht der Drucker eine gute Figur. Kloster Empfehlung!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a self-published author with my own website where I sell my books. This label printer is perfect for making the postage labels I need when sending out my books. Easy to set up, compact so it fits nicely on my desk, and, most importantly for me, it prints really quickly and clearly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Such a great addition to my business!
reviews.reviewText: I am only mad at myself for waiting this long to order this printer. I had been looking at it for a while and finally pulled the plug. Its super easy to instal, to use and it prints in seconds. I love that it doesnt require ink and that the labels are the perfect size for my packages. The price was great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Works really well for our small business
reviews.reviewText: Makes life so much easier than printing paper labels out and less waste. Occasionally spits out one blank label for every 50ish, but no major issue. Easy to use and setup
